plugin.capturer.name: Screenshot Tool
plugin.capturer.description: Professional screenshot tool with area capture, editing and OCR
plugin.capturer.description_detail: Professional screenshot tool with area capture, editing and OCR capabilities
plugin.capturer.features_html:
🎯 Main Features

  • 📸 Flexible Area Selection: Mouse drag to select capture area
  • ✂️ Image Editing: Supports cropping/annotation
  • 🔍 OCR Text Recognition: Intelligent text extraction
plugin.capturer.usage_html:
📋 Usage Instructions

Press {hotkey} to start capture

  1. Press the hotkey to enter capture mode
  2. Drag mouse to select capture area
  3. Use editing tools for annotation
  4. Save or copy the result
